ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fav
ygData.msgSnippet: ... well, i play all races/classes, and with the froggy extension, i can finally fullfill my rule: no two classes, no two races. we had 15 classes and 14
ygData.messageBody:
> Overall, what would be everyones favorite race/class to be?

well, i play all races/classes, and with the froggy extension, i can
finally "fullfill" my rule: no two classes, no two races. we had 15
classes and 14 races until now.

i have 3 chars over 50, 5 chars in the 40 range, my "youngest" ones
are not under 15.

so i make a small list (sort of top ten) of non-existing/-availible
races/classes i would like to play:

1. ogre monk <- my favorite
2. pixie enchanter or mage
3. froglok necromancer
4. shissar necromancer (or cleric)
5. faun bard or rogue
6. minotaur shaman (or cleric)
7. crystal spider monk
8. ice terror rogue
9. seafury warrior or bard
10. storm giant warrior or enchanter

have fun
- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
